# currentSystemCode

**Instance Property**

The system code most recently selected by the reader session during a polling sequence.

## Declaration

```swift
var currentSystemCode: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

The system code matches one of the entries in the array for the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Entitlements/com.apple.developer.nfc.readersession.felica.systemcodes] information property list key.

## Getting Current Information

- **currentIDm**: The manufacturer identifier for the system currently selected by the reader session.
